name: Phoenix Rosehip Anti-Aging Face Oil - For Dry Skin
about: What it is:A blend of luxe botanical oils and CoQ10 that visibly revitalizes dry skin or any skin in need of replenishment and moisture renewal..Skin Type:Normal and Dry.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:- CoQ10: Defends skin with antioxidant properties..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Formulated with effective natural ingredients and without fillers, this facial oil absorbs easily to supply moisture, vitamins, fatty acids, and antioxidants. It is non-comedogenic and silicone-free.
ingredients: -CoQ10: Defends skin with antioxidant properties. .-Rosehip Oil: Promotes healthy-looking skin. .-Sea Buckthorn Oil: Conditions and supports skin lipids for a softer, smoother feel. ..Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Extract, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Ubiquinone, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Tocopherol, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-In the AM and PM, apply three to 10 drops to cleansed and toned skin, avoiding your eye area..-Massage into skin..-Allow to absorb for one to three minutes before applying makeup..-Store at room temperature and out of direct sunlight...Recycling Instructions:.Place outer carton into paper recycling..Clean the pipette with warm water then gently remove it from the dropper by pulling downward, and recycle. Next, remove the soft bulb and discard it in the trash, but recycle the plastic collar. .Rinse the glass bottle thoroughly, and recycle.

reviews.review_title: The Ordinary is just as good for cheaper
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this facial oil and before Herbivore moved off of Posh Beauty and onto Sephora, it was affordable. Now, I suggested you save your money and buy any other rosehip facial oil. There is nothing significantly different about this facial oil than any other cheaper rosehip oil except for packaging and a darker colour. That is not worth the money, in my mind. I think it's a real shame that Herbivore has significantly increased their prices without significantly changing their product line. I appreciate the expansion of their product line, but frankly, I just can't afford to be a customer anymore.

reviews.review_text: Love it! It keeps my skin clear of blemishes and Iu2019m the winter dry air, it is an absolute necessity for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time reviewing Phoenix, but I've used up full bottles! It was a game-changer for me. I've lived several places with different climates, yet it's still performed well regardless.  I have combination, sensitive skin that's sometimes prone to hormonal acne near my jaw. (I used Accutane as a teen, so maybe this will be a helpful review for some of you.) Some popular ingredients will make me too oily and shiny at the drop of a hat... that includes hyaluronic acid, many peptides, and some silicones. Phoenix seems to calm and balance my face while tending to tone issues and small fine lines. Although I'm in my early 30s, I don't use retinols... I do, though, pair this with the Sephora bakuchiol serum, which has a good effect. (Bakuchiol first, then this as a moisturizer.)  Finally, I only use Phoenix at night unless my skin is feeling dry, but the effects are still noticeable and make me happy. I can't say I have problems with it turning either me or random things orange, but it's possible that could happen if you use too much? I only use four or five drops at a time, or occasionally less.  To be honest, this may be the most worthwhile thing the company makes. :) I think it's good value for money, personally, and while I've tried to dupe it, I haven't quite succeeded. Something about the ratio of ingredients suits me too well to be duplicated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using this for 2-3 weeks and I've seen major improvements already. I have combination, acne-prone skin so I have to be careful with oils. I put this oil on as a final step after first using my prescription clindamycin, Avene Tolerance cream, and lastly Mario Badescu's Protein Night Cream. I only use this at night but, wow, what a difference! I've had no breakouts and the fine lines are gone around my eyes, on my neck, and decolletage.

reviews.review_title: This oil completely changed my skin!

reviews.review_title: A godsend and a must for cold, dry winter weather.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this oil many years ago and found it too oily. I'm older now, and have been researching different oils that are best when it comes to aging and general moisturizing. I'm happy to find that Sephora carries the small size of Phoenix. First, there are only a few ingredients, and all are proven in my experience to be effective. Sea Buckthorn oil is divine, it grows in northern climes and is used as traditional medicine in Siberia, where it will quickly heal burns and frostbite. (rivalled only by bear grease in that capacity, but you have to have found bear roadkill to source it). Straight Sea buckthorn oil is available (The ordinary sells an inexpensive version) but it stains your skin a nicotine colour so...not ideal. When mixed with other ingredients it's staining qualities are no longer an issue. Meadowfoam oil is the other star ingredient IMO. This oil is so lovely and yet very hard to find. Fresh used to use it a lot, it was in their excellent soy cream that you can't get anymore, that's how I discovered it. So if it is so great why buy the small size, given that buying bigger is cheaper per milliliter? Because oil is somewhat unstable and once opened it starts to oxidise and having noticed either a markedly rapid loss of the oil product's smell (or worse, a rancid smell) I just feel like it's better to use smaller quantities to preserve the integrity of the product. Herbivore have been around awhile, and this oil was one of the original products. When I first discovered them I got the LApis oil (very good) and the facial spray (ditto). I was and still am impressed by the high quality and minimal ingredients. Herbivore has somewhat deviated from this with the newer products, no shade to them but so many have over 20 ingredients now, which is fine I guess but I prefer my skincare (oil especially) to err on the side of simplicity. This oil is going to be a g-dsend for cold dry winters, for sure.

reviews.review_text: While I'm a big fan of Herbivore, this oil is my favorite. It packs in all the ingredients my sensitive skin responds most to, leaving my face hydrated but not sticky or oily.

It has not personally broken me out either. It does have a funky smell though, like leftover take out. My skin tends to lean dry but I apply this after an HA serum and my face is dewy and youthful. This is a must have for me and I would recommend it to anyone with dry or aging skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample with one of my orders and I bought the full size because it worked.  I was suffering from extremely sensitive skin which changed due to my age.  It was always dry and I had to be careful with what I put on it because the wrong product would make me itch.  I have a moisturizer that helps but my skin would dry up after a few hours and my skin didn't really go back to what it was before.  Phoenix helped alleviate the dryness and itch within 1 use and continued use of the sample further improved my skin.  It is now going back to its previous elasticity and feels moisturized.  I still follow up with the moisturizer to lock it in but I attribute the improvements to this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I barely leave the review,but I like this one so much. It look normal at first, but when I have skin problems like used too much retinal a, sunburn,it always can make it calm down and rescue me, when it turned to second day, my skin back .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is super moisturizing, perfect for dry skin. My skin is both dry and oily Iu2019m not sure how but this for when itu2019s dry is so amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love skin care and this one is a game changer! I will only be using this oil from now on! The smell is amazing like wow! Makes my skin so soft and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this oil for 4 months now and I absolutely love it. I only use it at night in my alone routine because it does have an orangish hue on my pale skin. But Iu2019m the morning my skin is deeply hydrated, glowy, and without breakouts. I have sensitive skin and mild rosaecia. This oil gives me no problems. I havenu2019t noticed if it has combatted my premature signs of aging but I trust it is just as much as sunscreen does. I have used this a few times before my makeup and it gives a nice glow touch but remember to top off with sunscreen just in case.  I ONLY RATED 4 STAR BECAUSE I HAVENu2019T NOTICED THE ANTI-AGING PROPERTIES. Thatu2019s not to say itu2019s not working :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow wow wow! This oil is such a game changer. I have severely dry skin and I switched up a bunch of my skincare products to help meet my hydration needs and this was an oil I was watching for a long time. So happy I pulled the plug and bought the full size bottle. Just a few drops of this once to twice a day (morning and night) and my skin barrier within the last week has taken a 180. My routine includes: 1. Tata Harper Sensitized Skin Line face wash (3-4 times a week) and the Herbivore Pink Cloud + Squalane Makeup Removing Wash (3-4 times a week)   2. Tata Harper Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Facial Spray  3. Tata Harper Hyalauronic Moisturizer and/or Tata Harper Sensitized skin line moisturizer 4. Sunday Riley Lactic Acid Treatment 5. Tata Harper Creme Rich (3 times a week) 6. Herbivore Phoenix Rosehip Facial Oil   Literally saved my compromised skin barrier! Highly reccommend.

reviews.review_title: The best facial oil for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have REALLY dry skin and this oil helps a lot with that. It absorbs quickly and doesnu2019t leave my face super shiny. I use it daily, morning & night. At night, I cleanse, tone, apply the Laneige Sleeping Mask (also VERY good) then a few drops of the oil to seal it up. In the morning, I use only 2-3 drops of the oil, after my cleansing routine sometimes with or without a moisturizer, especially if Iu2019m using a sunscreen, because I donu2019t want to look too shiny under my makeup. It is a oil after all, but my makeup goes on smoother with it, so itu2019s a win for me. Itu2019s definitely worth the price, because a little goes a long way and youu2019ll have this bottle for a while. If you have really dry skin ( dry patches, etcu2026) try it, you wonu2019t regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I had gotten a free sample, and then was really disappointed to see what the price point was and originally decided not to purchase. Then I moved to a location where the water is so overly chlorinated that my skin became so absolutely dry and irritated that I broke down and decided to get the whole bottle. It was well worth it. Iu2019ve been using it in my nightly routine for about a week and by the third morning waking up my skin was soft and full of moisture! Iu2019m curious to see how it works for me in the winter months when my skin gets unbearably dry. Hasnu2019t caused any breakouts either, which I know sometimes oils tend to do. I do use a cleanser in my morning routine before using my daily moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Magic in a bottle. This oil makes my skin so smooth, soft, and bouncy-hydrated. I couldnu2019t believe how good it was the first time I tried it. The good news is that a little bit goes a long way(since itu2019s definitely on the pricier side)- I use 3 drops for my entire faceu2026 AND it is rather a large bottle(2 oz) so you can get a lot of bang for your buck, if youu2019re careful with it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been in my u201clovesu201d for about a year because of the price, and I decided to finally add it to my cart during the VIB sale. And now, I regret  not buying this sooner!! This oil has totally transformed my skin. I noticed results after one use. Warmed up 4 drops in my hands and pressed it into my skin at night - woke up with super soft, brighter, smoother, hydrated, glowing skin... and it just keeps getting better and better everyday. Best of all, Iu2019ve been using it for over 2 weeks now so I think I can safely say it does not break me out, hallelujah! It actually seems to help prevent and heal existing blemishes. My skin has just never looked this healthy overall, itu2019s the first time in years I actually donu2019t want to wear foundation some days. I canu2019t see myself without this product anymore, like ever. Highly recommend you give it a try. Ps: Make sure you keep this beautiful bottle stored out of sunlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow- I was kind of a non believer of face oils, but this has changed me forever. I have fair, sensitive, combination skin. The thought of putting oil on my face made me really nervous, and uncomfortable. I received a sample of this and ended up purchasing the full size. I used 2 drops in my palms, warmed it up in my hands, and patted it on my face and the results were intense!!! It didnu2019t seem to do much for the lower half of my face- but my forehead has completely transformed!!!    The deep lines between my brows were almost completely gone after one use!!!! The horizontal lines on my forehead are gone! I honestly canu2019t believe it. I donu2019t understand it, but Iu2019m excited to explore the world of face/body oils!! Thank you Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously a game changer! I first got this in a mini version in a kit and it lasted me a long time because I only use like 2-3 drops each time. I was scared to buy the full size because its so expensive but I was really impressed with the results. I'm in my mid 20s with sensitive/dry skin and this facial oil is really hydrating. When I apply it at night I notice my skin looks plump and feels so soft the next morning (I also apply the Laneige Water Bank Moisture Cream). The only thing I donu2019t like about it is the bottle, it is sooo pretty but the dropper cap broke like a month after I bought it so I had to transfer the oil into a new glass bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every oil from the ordinary and then realized that it wasn't actually 100% pure anything..  there were a bunch of fillers and I discontinued my use of any if there products. This product however was a game changer! I learned that the oil is actually mostly helpful in that it strengthens the cell walls in your skin so it's mostly for long term benefits, yet I saw dramatic results immediately and kept seeing improvements for months that are boe maintaining extremely well. My skin is brighter, more plump, even and SOFT! I use a couple drops and mix it in my cerave cream and use it morning and night and my skin has never been better! I've been using it that was for three months and I'm a little over half way through the bottle. By this I mean if you have the money it's more than worth it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. Use this after drunk elephant baby facial, thank me later! This will always be a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wooph. After hearing all the hype about this brand, I can finally say I get it. For months I was like what-you mean pretty much all they have is oils? That being said I was still curious and wanted to try the brand but didnu2019t want to spend the money. I saw a free sample for this online and thought sure why not, then I can say Iu2019ve tried it and be done with it. But oh no, I wasnu2019t done with it. Because shockingly I fell in love with this, and I get- I get the brand, I get the hype. And the best way I can describe it is it just screams luxury. I go about my day and I think about the time when I can put this on my face....and although Iu2019m a skincare enthusiast Iu2019ve never really been this excited about putting on a product before.  So-I have combination skin but I love a good dewy look and a thicker moisturizer. To me, this is a medium weight oil. I wouldnu2019t quite call this a u201cdryu201d oil as some have, but I see how somebody could say that as it absorbs so much better than letu2019s say a traditional pure rosehip seed oil that kinda sits on your face all slick. That being said-it is still heavier than your squalane, your seabuckthorn. I do believe combination skin people can wear this comfortably- as I do morning and night. But people who donu2019t really like oils might only want to use this at night. Now if you have normal or dry skin, I canu2019t think of a world where you wouldnu2019t love this.  Now Iu2019ve tried oils Iu2019ve liked before, but never enough to repurchase. I would be like here skin hereu2019s some oil drink it and my T zone was like no thanks and spit it out. This absorbs so wonderfully and my skin accepts it, weird as that may sound. The smell is divine, I canu2019t really describe but itu2019s an invigorating scent. The orange color is weird...it does lightly discolor my light skin but not enough to notice it long term. Now is it worth $88? Maybe not-but I love it so I will pay it. What youu2019re paying for is luxury, youu2019re paying for the experience, how it feels to put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me first say I have been using Josie Maran Aragon oil for many years, at least 7.  Last year, I started using retinol, and for those of you that have over used retinol, you know what it can do to your skin.  I had been using the aragon oil for retinol overuse and it did an ok job.  I recently got this product as a sample, and hadn't touched it.  UNTIL - after using Paula's Choice 1% retinol too many nights in a row, my face got extremely dry and patchy around my mouth.  I couldn't really wear foundation during this stretch of time because it would just turn flaky and dry no matter what.  So this morning I decided to try this sample instead of wearing foundation.  and - WOW!  It is so hydrating that after putting it on my face, my dry skin flaky flare up was gone.  Not only that, but hours later it is still gone.  The oil sinked right into my skin.  It isn't shiny or greasy either.  I didn't put foundation over it so I can't speak to how it works with makeup. Although pricier than Josie Maran, I think it is worth it for what it does to your skin.  I will definitely be purchasing a full size, and this will replace aragon oil in my routine.  This oil would be great in the winter too.  I am interested to find out how long a bottle lasts though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my face yellow..does nothing, but smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This beautiful orange nectar was on my wish list for awhile but the price always made me hesitate. A few months ago, I ignored the price tag and let one lucky Sephora Associate swipe my credit card, and Iu2019ve never looked backed.  This is a medium-weight oil that is SUPER hydrating yet non-greasy. It leaves my skin silky smooth, soft, refreshed, renewed, and glowing. Iu2019ve been using this for the last 3 months by adding 2-3 drops to my gel-moisturizer every morning. My skin stays plump ALL day. If I could only live with one facial oil for the rest of my life, itu2019d be this one. Seriously, Iu2019m not exaggerating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing oil! I have combo skin. It can go oily in spring/summer, and dry in winter. I have tried lots of different oils and have spent over $200 on a facial oil. This one surpassed my expectations. I use a couple drops at the end of my pm routine after all active products. It soaks into my skin right away. I wake up with glowing skin. My skin is very happy and it's helping with inflammation. My skin can be reactive and break out, but this oil is helping a lot. I'm so happy I finally tried it. It is also starting to lighten some temporary pigmentation I have. This oil also has wonderful ingredients, so I do think it's worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I bought the limited edition u201cJewel boxu201d set so I got to try 3 of Herbivoreu2019s oils. I loved them all but I chose to repurchase the full size of this one because I felt like it was def the most hydrating for me and I noticed my skin looked healthiest when I used it regularly. The smell is pleasant enough. It does have an orange color when applied though and it does leave yellow stain on my white pillow cases. It does come clean in the wash, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivoreu2019s Phoenix face oil is a really hydrating oil that leaves my skin super baby soft. This is actually my favorite oil of the entire Herbivore line. I have more acne prone combo skin, not dry as this product calls out to be a good use for, but I love it nonetheless. I didnu2019t have good luck with their lapis oil and I tried both emeralds oils, but this is my holy grail from them. Very hydrating. I mix this in with my moisturizer at night and wake up with renewed skin. No breakouts and Iu2019m about halfway through the (small size) bottle. Definitely would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail of face oil. I used daily and my skin is baby soft and feels so hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin, it makes my makeup look awful. Since Iu2019ve been using this my skin feels so hydrated and my foundation looks 10x better.

reviews.review_text: Great oil, super hydrating! I prefer the blue tansy oil because I have acne-prone skin, but this one is pretty good too.

reviews.review_title: expensive but worth it for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I didnu2019t love this oil so much because itu2019s so expensive but as someone with very dry eczema prone skin this helps sooth my irritation. I use this oil specifically after retinol and Iu2019ve never experienced any dryness from my retinol because of it.

reviews.review_title: Don't believe the aesthetic and insta hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually write reviews, especially negative ones. But I feel so duped by this brand and product I just had to throw in my opinion. I bought this as a replacement for the Korres rose + vitamin c serum, as I heard the formula changed and not for the better, so I was recommende this as a replacement. The reviews were great so despite the price tag I went for it. Ugh.  Listen, y'all this is not worth the better part of a hundred dollars. I've been using it daily since July and have seen zero difference in my skin. Putting it on, it leaves a weird coloring to my skin, making me feel like it doesn't actually soak in at all. I have an olive tone and it makes me look weirdly sallow and jaundiced, so I only use it at night.  It also pills HORRIBLY. Maybe the worst of any skincare product I've tried. Don't even think of putting anything on over this because it makes a gross mess of my hands and face. I literally had to wipe my face with a towel after using this under another product because it pilled so badly.   Unfortunately I'm stubborn and want my money's worth so despite hating this useless serum I keep using it. No change in brightness, tone, nothing. The only plus side to this is if you actually like it, the bottle will last forever, because even after months of daily use I haven't even reached the tip of the diamond label. You only need two little drips to cover your whole face, I don't even have to squeeze the dropper, enough drips out to cover my whole face so it's going to last a long time. So it looks like I'll be stuck with this thing forever. I hate it. Every time I look at it I'm furious that I spent money on it. The branding and packaging are exquisite, but the product is absolutely useless. I can't wait to be rid of it and I'll never try something from this brand again honestly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this oil but itu2019s now been 3 months of using this day and night in my skincare routine and it has hardly made any changes. The Ordinaryu2019s Seabuck thorn oil has provided more bounce in my skin and it is much more hydratingu2014not to mention, much cheaper too! My skin is dry but fairly clear, dark eye circles but thatu2019s it. The oil itself goes on very nicely and feels hydrating, but after a few hours, my skin feels more dry than before applying it sometimes! I would say for that price, you can find much better oils, for sure.

I have dry skin and this oil is wonderful for moisture and as a last step in your morning or evening routine. The bottle is huge so I put a bit of it in a sample size bottle and use it throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: An oil that doesn't break me out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so badly! I first saw this in an Allana Davidson video, and when I looked into it, I was excited by the ingredients of Sea Buckthorn and Meadowfoam. Unfortunately, I just feel like it didn't do anything for my skin-- my face didn't feel more hydrated and it didn't fade my acne scars. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a new holy grail for my skin care routine. Iu2019ve been using this for about two months now and it has been amazing. reviews.review_text: I want to give this product a better review. The actual oil is fantastic, it is light but intensive, has not caused acne and makes my skin feel and look so luxe after applying. My problem with this product is the packaging, the dropper to be specific. My boyfriend bought me this oil for christmas in addition to the Lapis oil and I had to return this oil because the dropper was covered in dried up, orange oil. The dropper seemed to be the malfunction, returned and contacted Herbivore who sent me another dropper. I tried the new Phoenix oil and it has the same issue where the top of the dropper becomes disconnected to the rest of the lid, leaving product open to air and extremely prone to spillage. iu2019m almost even afraid to pinch too hard in fear of totally ripped it out like i did with the first bottle i got. Herbivore seems to use the same dropper for all of their oils, and while I have somewhat of an issue with all of the droppers, none of them seem to be as bad as the Phoenix which is very very prone to being disconnected from the lid, rendering the product and dropper useless. For an $88 product, youu2019d want to be spending that on quality packaging that will limit exposure to air to keep the oil fresh. Disappointed that this is the downfall of this product for me, and as much as i love the actual oil, i probably wonu2019t repurchase because the dropper is very iffy and very easily broken.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample from Herbivore directly. It's their third product I have tried, and I am kinda in love with the brand now :/ I'm normally into TO products because of price point, but now that I feel more comfortable in the skincare work, and skincare has become more of a priority for me, I am going to suck it up and keep buying this. I love it. Only been using it for three weeks, but it doesn't dry out my skin, and I believe it is actually doing what it claims.

Honestly worth the price. The bottle is huge and I can see it lasting a long time!   Other oils Iu2019ve tried in the past have broken me out and I figured out the culprit was coconut oil. Sadly all of the other Herbivore oils have coconut oil, but I was excited when I realized Phoenix didnu2019t because I love their products! I first tried it in a mini size and it was love at first use. It honestly feels so good on my skin, like incredibly luxurious. It hasnu2019t caused any breakouts and has helped balance out my oily skin. I use 3 drops in the AM & PM. My face looks oily for a bit but it soaks in really nicely. It also wears really well under makeup! I ended up splurging and buying the full size when my mini ran out and have zero regrets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Phoenix is a new holy grail for me!  My skin is so supple and soft, and my skin just drinks it up.  I occasionally have dry patches, and this solves it.  Apply at the end of your nightly routine as a moisturizer and wake up to incredible texture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I will say I didnu2019t like this oil at first. It is extremely thick and I felt like it didnu2019t absorb that well onto the skin. I started spraying the herbivore rose water spray and when it was still a little damp I applied this oil. It works WONDERS!! I wake up with dewy, hydrated skin. I gave this 4 stars because I felt for the price it should work well on its own. I found it only worked well for me if I used the rose water spray or mixed with another serum to help it absorb.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't even begin to explain how incredible this oil is. I noticed results in three uses. I get stress induced cystic bumps on the cheeks and dry patches - this oil cleared them up literally over night! obsessed with this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I watched Allana's quick review of this product while she was getting ready for the day and found that she really like this and has gotten rid of her breakouts. I got a sample and tried it, (sample lasted for 7 days) and I felt that it really did change my skin. It absorbed quickly and I wore it underneath my make up. It didn't make me oily but I used 2-3 drops and it was enough for me. So far so good, been using it for a three weeks and my skin is loving it. Clear, smooth and happy skin. I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this I thought it was too heavy for my skin. Got it during the spring VIB sale so thought maybe it would be better for winter, so I ordered the Herbivore Orchid oil, but hated the smell of that so I gave this another shot. SO GLAD I DID I LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love rose hip oil the oil benefits are phenomenon but I cant stand fishy smell.  So I bought this oil and tried. Still I can smell fishy rose hip but much better. Very light and easy to absorb into skin . I use as booster like after wash face n add 3 drops of this oil on wet face and massage. Then toner , eye serum then herbivore emerald oil. I love this oil but I gave 4 stars bc doesnu2019t work like a moisturizer to me ( I have dry n aging skin) and didnu2019t get wow results like 100% rose hip oil dose. But still great oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite morning facial oil to date!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this oil!!!! I've been messing around with my skin care regimen a lot since I moved from a humid place to a dry place and this oil has done wonders for my skin.  I've always had dry skin and am now fighting dehydration which has caused breakouts and this oil has really helped repair my skin and stop breakouts.  During the winter I need some extra moisture so I've been experimenting with putting different moisturizers under this but I think in the summer I'll only need to use this oil.  If your skin isn't super dry like mine, this oil would probably be the only thing you need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best oil i've ever used. So light weighted and the only oil I've used that I can say it's absorbed fast. My skin looks  brighter and feels softer after one week. I'm also using the pink cloud cream from Herbivore. Great combination. My skin is hydrated all day long. Really good products. Now I'm a fan of this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is gorgeous.  It feels light going on, not thick like Juno.   My skin feels so great after using it; hydrated and soft. Iu2019ve shared with many friends and they love it too.  Also great for cuticles.

reviews.review_title: Could not tell I went through the whole bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used the entire bottle up and did not noticed any improvement or impact on my skin. It was the equivalent of putting water on my face, would have gotten about the same amount of impact.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is really average. I have dry skin and I really wanted an oil that would take away the tightness and make me glow a bit more. This did not do that. The oil just stayed  on the surface of my skin and didnu2019t give me the hydration I needed. Even when mixed with moisturizer didnu2019t do it for me.  Also itu2019s super expensive when in reality just feels and smells like jojoba oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that skews more to the oily side and this oil works so well without making my skin greasy. I mix it with a gel moisturizer, no more than two drops, and it feels heavenly on my face. A little really goes a long way. I got it in a mini's set and even with the high price point, I will probably purchase the full size once I'm done with the mini.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this oil for winter. Not 5 stars because the oil leaves a yellow stain on my white pillowcase :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolutely gorgeous facial oil. I use it at night and I can tell you that the orangey-hue does not get onto your sheets or pillows (they are safe). But I have found my night-time oil in this. I am always trying new products, but this is my forever go-to for a nighttime oil. It's that good! So moisturizing, with a faint natural scent. I've been using it for about a month now and you can barely tell. And I use probably 4-5 drops every night. Overall I am so incredibly pleased with this product that I cannot recommend enough. And, yes, everyone's skin is different, but at least sample this if you can. For me: this stuff is gold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has completely changed my skin!! I struggle with redness and texture and this has helped so much. Along with the Youth To The People face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Its more on the  thicker type of serum but it made my skin soft and plump the next day. I mix it with other creams too and it doesnu2019t feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With the plethora of skincare items I want to try, itu2019s rare for me to repurchase something but this face oil is incredible. I have sensitive combination skin probe to hormonal acne and redness. This oil helped to calm my redness, breakouts are less frequent, and my skin is deeply hydrated. Using day and night, my last bottle lasted almost 9 months, so worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful oil! I am seeing a difference already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is good but not great. It absorbs easily and not greasy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not going to lie, my first 5 days using this, I looked like I just came out of the gym with an oily mess on my face. But after those 5 days, it stopped looking so oily, maybe my skin got used to it? But my skin was so lifted and awake. Felt like my scars healed. I had a bad cut from a razor and it went away in 3 days after using this. Keep in mind I used their green tea water toner (1st) the. Orchid serum (2nd) mixed Pheonix and Lapis together. Really changed my skin. PLEASE MAKE A SUNSCREEN!!!!!!!! I will love you forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfourtunately this oil did not anhthing for me. Every night i used it I woke up with dry, irritated, patchy skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yall I sampled this today. I'm middle eastern and the smell hit my nose at the store and it was wayyyy to familiar so I asked for a sample to take home. My mom laughed until she cried for 30 minutes straight after I told her it was $88 per that small bottle. Yall I'm pretty sure this is some kind of mix of I think in English yall call it mustard and jasmine oil... maybe a lil rose water in there as well. All things we have in my kitchen for cooking & huge bottles of as well for less than $10 each... & it may be too thick for skin on the regular. I wonder if this may make some ppl break out...  Now I may be wrong... but Ima just leave this here in case it helps someone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trial/travel size of this in an Herbivore trial set and it was alright. It lasted me a bit over a month, but I donu2019t notice any real changes in my skin while I used it. The oil didnu2019t leave my skin dry, over oily, or break me out but otherwise nothing really changed when I swapped from using the maracuja oil Iu2019ve been using for the past few months. My skin was its usual combination with slight oily-ness in my t-zone with a small bit of dryness on my nose and the side of my cheek. Iu2019m not sure if my skin would need go use it longer for any skin differences to be noticeable, but for how much it costs, I wouldu2019ve liked to see more results in my skins texture, complexion, or moisture levels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most lovely oil I have ever, ever used! If I could marry an oil, this would be the one I would commit to. To start with, the ingredients are stunning, and it contains CoQ10 (a great anti-aging, pro collagen ingredient). The bottle is huge (50ml, thatu2019s almost twice most other oils). It has just the right amount of slip, I put it on at night over my AHA/BHA/Retinol/Retin A (depends on my mood), and I *always* wake up with soft, supple, plump skin. Last, it has no added fragrance but I love how it smells. I would describe it as an earthy-ish, honey-ish, very faint rose smell. It smells like spring.   For reference- I have normal to leaning slightly dry skin. This oil did not break me out BUT nothing breaks me out so Iu2019m not a good reference for acne prone skin. :( However, if you are normal or dry, I can confidently say, you will love this oil too!  Ok, one last thing (sorry), I use a teensy bit under my eyes before applying concealer in the morning, my creases are nearly invisible and the makeup applies smoothly overtop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this oil at night for the better part of a month, and I'm majorly impressed with how soft and plump my skin looks!  This is too heavy-duty for day (at least on my combo skin) but it's a dream at night.  If you're looking for a clean formula that's free of coconut derivatives (which some people, myself included, can find pore clogging) this is a great luxury option to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating! I have very dry skin and it is worse in the winter, so I've been using it as a primer under my foundation and it makes my skin look hydrated and glowy all day, my foundation is not as patchy as it can be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I use it after cleansing, serum, and moisturizing. This should be the LAST step in your skin care routine before makeup or before going to sleep. It is an oil so sits on top and helps your skin absorvb the moisturizers/etc that you put on underneath. My skin feels plump and moisturized after using this. I am not a big fan of the smell--smells like herbs to me, but the smell goes away quickly and the product is definitely worth it. Better to not have artificial fragrance anyway--ruins your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is FIRE. I love this one. It smells good, nice, light oil and it actually helps my inflamed, red skin when I have flares. It keeps my skin calm and is helping to fight other skin issues. Honestly, if it just kept my skin calm and flare free: Iu2019m happy. Hate the price but itu2019s worth it to me. Herbivore is a great brand and Iu2019m in love with oils like Phoenix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t express how wonderful this worked for me. I have extremely dry, red blotchy, sensitive skin. I used this at night and after 1 night I could already see huge improvement. Redness is basically done now and a week. This does not feel greasy, soaks in your skin immediately, your skin is left incredibly soft, firm, toned and hydrated after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought both the lapis set and the Phoenix set. I really wanted to love the products but they might be too strong for my skin. I slowly I coporated into my routine but it caused me to be red, blotchy and have bumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed by this oil, especially considering the price point. I received it in a kit from Herbivore and was really excited to try it. Unfortunately, I didn't find it to be particularly moisturizing. The other issue was that it kept pilling-- I tried to figure out what was causing this, eliminating product by product, but the same thing kept happening, no matter what I used underneath it, including other Herbivore products! I still love this line, though, and am hoping to have better results with the Emerald oil.

reviews.review_title: Nice but not a huge difference
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought it was pretty nice, though I was unsure how much benefit I was getting. I liked it enough to not return it and keep using it until it was gone. Then I learned never to buy expensive products in glass :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to find a face oil I loved and that worked for me. I've tried so many! Most break me out. This one is incredible. It helps my very dry skin get through the very dry winter. It clears up my dry spots around my nose and leaves my skin literally glowing and fresher looking. I like the smell and find it doesn't last long, which is good. And I have not broken out with this! But some things to note: I don't think it's a daytime/morning use product. It takes a little while to sink in, so you're better off putting it on at night. And it's super expensive. I got it during the fall sale, so it was a better deal, but I think I'd wait till the next sale to buy again. Lucky that 3-4 drops is more than enough to cover your whole face. You can use it very sparingly and get excellent results.

reviews.review_title: Over all a good facial oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good oil. Itu2019s a little on the thicker side, so I use it mixed with an emollient (drunk elephants B hydra) to help it sink in quicker. It does have a floral smell which I think is mostly due to the types of oils used. Pros:  great nourishing oil blend, clean skin care, moisturizes, the bottle contains a lot of product. Cons: takes a little to sink in, has essential oils in it so sensitive skin may have an issue.   I will be keep this in rotation and Iu2019m interested to try more from the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best oil I have ever used!! I have dry sensitive skin, I get dry patches and have acne scars from past. It has cleared it all up, made my skin soft and supple!!   I got all three oils from herbivore, this by far is the best for dry sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Leaves your skin super soft and helps with fine lines + younger looking skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil makes my face feel so great. I simple love all of the Herbivore oils. I currently use with the Emerald glow oil at night.  That is a great team!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I first got a sample Of it as the lady helping me out insisted I try it. Itu2019s real steep in price but helps amazingly with my very dry skin. I apply it at night so itu2019s able to absorb for longer and that way no one can see how greasy you look. The product also smells amazing, and the scent lingers. The bottle also goes a long way. Iu2019ve had it for two months so far and almost near halfway down the bottle if that helps anyone feel better about the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the sample size in a gift set, and this oil is wonderful. I am 31 with normal skin. However, I live in the Midwest where harsh winters call for a little extra moisture during the season. I use a very small amount after toner, and before makeup. It helps product go on smoothly and gives a pleasant glow that lasts. The scent is neutral. I can't say if I've seen any long-term benefits yet, but my skin is hydrated, makeup goes on smoothly, and I am pleased with this product. Oh, and it's natural   vegan which makes it all the better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use all herbivore products at night and in the morning; this one baffles me. I donu2019t notice anything different after two months; sometimes when I use my skin feels discomforting in the mornings. I recommend their orchid oil, lapis oil and prism.  I love those three with their jasmine toner.  I recommend going to their website and buying the smaller, cheaper travel size before you spring for this. For me, it did nada.   I gave it two stars because I support the brand and their other products are amazing but this is not a product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have difficult skin that's also sensitive so often I make my own facial oils with only a few ingredients. I'm 39 with sun damage and lines already, combined with an oily t-zone. Its challenging to find something moisturizing enough that doesn't clog my pores and make my face an oil slick. This oil has worked beautifully. I use a little (very little it goes a long way) with Drunk Elephant Protini at night and I swear it's making a difference in my skin. Sea buckthorn oil is challenging to use when making DIY oils as you typically have to dilute and it can still stain everything around you orange. The Herbivore oil has a great combination of ingredients and I havent had any issues with staining. Having ordered many of the ingredients found in the Herbivore oil for DIY products, the overall price is steep though. Would be on the fence about reordering solely based on price not quality of the product.

reviews.review_title: Life Changer... Thank you Herbivore and Sephora
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first review on anything and I absolutely think this oil deserves it. A few years ago, I was going through major stress. College... 2 jobs... life... and it was evident on my face. I broke out with cystic pimples and incredibly dry skin. To the point where I would have dry patches on my face after coming from work... even after having applied loads of creams to my face. I tried many oils before and none of them would absorb. Until I decided to bite the bullet and try this one. It CHANGED my life. I started to apply this every evening consistently and I noticed RAPID RESULTS. My skin felt smoother, more healthy looking. My dry patches were gone and it helped lighten many acne scars and help CONTROL much of my acne. I obviosly had to alter some bad habits in my life (like drink more water), but this product has stuck with me and now I am on my second bottle and noticed my skin only get better. More PLUMPED and SOFT. Those who are on the fence... just buy it. You won't regret it.

reviews.review_title: get it! you wont regret it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if I cant have my NUDE rescue oil in my life, I'm glad this is at least out there. love what it does to my skin! i rarely break out , my pores are great, and my skin tone is nice and even. always. best purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product!!! makes my skin glow and really moisturizing!!! my skin feels great after 3-4 drops, best oil I've used so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favourite facial oil. It makes my skin smoother, brighter and more even toned. It aids in fading my hyper pigmentation and it locks in moisture. I love this oil so much Iu2019ve bought the full size and the sample set twice for this oil in particular.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic nighttime oil. Even if you have oily skin, this should still work and might help reduce your skinu2019s overproduction. I find my skin looks clearer, smoother and brighter as quickly as overnight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading all the great reviews I was excited to try this oil.  It was just ok for me.  It did not feel super hydrating on my skin and I also had some redness after using it.  I ended up returning it.  It is a pretty pricey oil and it was not what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really happy with this oil. Itu2019s the first one that Iu2019ve tried that didnu2019t cause some pimples. Itu2019s very hydrating for my dry areas and does not cause any problems in my oily areas. I do think my skin looks better after using this for a month. Canu2019t pinpoint what it is but maybe more even toned. I will definitely continue to purchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey but great oil. Cleared my eczema.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry, mature skin, and I live in an arid climate. This just sits on top of my skin. It never felt like it soaked in. This oil is definitely the culprit in some cheek clogging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this religiously, every morning and every night. Sometimes I'll switch it up for something else (like my hydrationist lotion) so my skin doesn't get to used to a certain product so that it wont work anymore but this is the best thing ever. It really rehydrates your skin and makes it incredibly soft and it smells nice too. It also comes in a cute little rectangular glass bottle, so be careful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is fantastic! Clear improvement in my skin and you get SO MUCH for your money. Definitely worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. My skin was dry and dull. I couldn't find the right moisturizer for my skin despite trying a dozen different brands, etc. I got the mini assortment box from Herbivore and it literally changed my skin tone, feel, moisture level, and appearance; especially this oil. It's fantastic. It feels good, smells good, and my skin is AMAZING. I HIGHLY recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went to my nearby sephora ( Cerritos) for an anti aging and good moisturizing product for night time. And there was this lovely makeup artist girl named Pillette who listened to my concerns about my skin very carefully then suggested a few products. After discussing a bit more she gave me three samples of different products. One of those was this amazing oil, first I was not so sure when I sniffed out the smell of this oil kind of mustardy;) but Pillette assured me that I should give it a try given the benefits. And I love using it on my face night and day both, I will buy full product soon. Thank you again Pillette !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this after falling in love with the lapis facial oil, and was sadly disappointed. I have fairly normal skin, and this seemed to congest my pores and break my skin out. Guess Iu2019ll go back to lapis next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this product. Skin looks GREAT when I wake up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted, so badly to love this oil, but it simply did not work out for me. It made me break out in little pimples around my nose, cheeks and forehead and managed to make areas of my skin very red. After seeing SO many great reviews I thought for sure this would be a HG product for me, but nope. I used it during the day/night, by itself or under my regular moisturizer or serum and it just didnu2019t work. All these reviews about how it isnu2019t oily.... well I used 3 drops for my whole face and it never fully absorbed. Bummed out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes!!! If youu2019ve been debating about buying this, get it! I struggle with redness as well as dry skin and this is my new holy grail product. I also use the Lapis oil and my skin has never looked better. You get a lot of product also which helps since itu2019s a little pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I use this as the last step of my skincare (all herbivore) at nighttime. I wake up to the most hydrated beautiful skin. I originally ordered the small size and then I bought the full size. If you have dry skin you will love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I use this after my serum and moisturizer. This facial oil is not heavy, it does not sit on top of your face (it soaks in quickly) and it does not make you feel oily. Super soft face after using it. Not a heavy scent also.

reviews.review_title: Great replacement for Sunday Riley's Flora!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When Sunday Riley discontinued Flora oil, I did a lot of research to find a night time replacement oil. I am so happy I went with Phoenix Oil. It's not heavy, absorbs easily, and my skin looks great. I loved Flora, but I love Phoenix even more! I highly recommend this for night, Orchid for day, and Blue Tanscy mask every other day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this oil along with their pink cloud  moisturizer and im not quite sure which one has been making the most diffrence but this has def. left my skin feeling smooth, sinks in well to the skin and helps evens out my skin tone. the downside is ...... the price is just unrealistic for most women sadly .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First let me say I wanted to love this oil. If you could rate packaging and smell alone I would rate it 5 stars but the product was so disappointing in my case. I tried it out for two days to see if it would work for me, sadly it didnu2019t. It just sat on top of my face making me look like I dipped my face in olive oil. I felt like a pizza slice and now matter how many hours went by it wouldnu2019t absorb into my skin. It also clogged my pores so back to Sephora it went.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First impressions: its extremely fast absorbing.  Love the way that my skin feels and looks.  I've been using this in the evenings after the Herbivore Brighten mask and I have seen an improvement on my dark spots.  I might even use this in the morning during the dry winter months.

reviews.review_title: I canu2019t express how much I truly love this!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has saved my skin. I would usually have to exfoliate every night and put on multiple lotions to keep my dry skin from turning into full on alligator skin, but I hated that my skin would feel greasy after and that by the end of the day I was dry again. So in an attempt to end this awful cycle I got this oil and the Prism exfoliating glow potion. And it did EXACTLY what I hoped it would do. Even using it on its own keeps my skin moisturized but NOT greasy throughout the day and saves my skin from having to get roughly exfoliated every night. My mom tried it as well and was also absolutely blown away by how well it worked with her skin too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely in love with this oil. I apply it the evening and in the day time over my main serum. currently I tone woth fresh rose, then in the evening I use DE glycolic Framboose serum.  followed by Advances night serum. then I apply the Phoenix oil over  then a moisturizer and top it off with YTP goji berry oil. I've been using all other products prior to the Phoenix on that order but once I added the Phoenix my skin just amped up its beauty.  I'm in my mid 40s a smoker and my skin has never looked and felt so hydrated , supple and almost line f3ee.  holy grail here .. make sure to out the extra on your hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a mini sample from a Herbivore Botanicals set. LIFE CHANGING! I have never used facial oils and do not see the point of them but whenever I apply this oil every night, I wake up with skin as soft as a baby's butt. And it's very satisfying putting this oil on my face as you can see the dead skin cells and gunk on your face. I was surprised how much of that I had considering I rarely wear makeup and take care of my skin well. I also noticed on Day 2 of applying that my blackheads are slowly beginning to go away! Totally recommend this product. Pricey af though so go for the set or a mini sample first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best product for real, natural and DEEP hydration! And serious glow.  Ive never used oil before because i break out but this has been a game changer.  I wake up with less my face less oily because its so hydrated overnight, and i stay matte after applying makeup because (again) when skin is hydrated it produces less oil of its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. I had my doubts about how an oil would work.  Others I had tried (like Farsali) left my skin drier and patchier. This stuff is my new Holy Grail. Within 48 hours of use I noticed immediate improvement in fine lines, texture and discoloration of my skin. Combine Pheonix + Prism and there is nothing this combo cannot accomplish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this oil! This was my introduction to Herbivore and now I've purchased several more products from their line. First, a little goes a long way, which is nice because a bottle will last long. Second, it absorbs well and can be worn alone or under makeup without having a greasy look. You just have to let it sit before applying other products. The results are fantastic. My skin glows and looks nicely moisturizer, fine lines less noticeable, and skin texture is softer. I am now using this with the Prism glow potion and Blue Tansy mask and I'm seeing great results overall.   Side note: 42 years of age, fair skin, acne prone (hormonal), dry to normal skin, some early signs of aging (taking pretty good care of my skin since a teen though).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail and fountain of youth! I saw results after the first use. I have sensitive skin and this has not irritated my skin at all. I am a tired mom and this definitely perks up my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this facial oil so much! My skin is super dry and this has kept it moisturized and has even evened out my skin tone. Itu2019s so easy to apply and itu2019s not sticky at all. I use it every night and sometimes in the morning. I get hormonal acne but this stuff has even managed to help that as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a deeply moisturizing oil, if that is what you are looking for. I donu2019t think I would recommend it for dry skin. I have noticed after using this product that I wake up with a much more even looking skin tone, kind of like my vitamin C serums do. The smell is okay, it goes on greasy, but once it absorbs there is no greasiness left. I love that the ingredients are all natural without any junk. I really like this product for what it is, but Amore Pacific products are higher quality and longer lasting effects on my opinion. I donu2019t feel like my skin gets enough moisture form this product which is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. I would still recommend his product though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing after first use. I applied this oil after the pink cloud moisturizer. I woke up with a glowing and radiant complexion. My husband even complimented me over coffee. Itu2019s crazy how amazing the results are. My skin has also never been softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this. I use it at night after I wash my face and afterward I apply kiehls ultra facial cream. It makes my skin soft, and I feel that I donu2019t look as tired in the morning. It absorbs quickly as well which is a huge bonus. Love the packaging and the natural ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

I usually get a lot of patchiness in that area on my foundation by mid day but this has worked wonders for me. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't find this oil anything special. For me the Fresh Seaberry oil works best. This oil was just average. Didn't add anything and didn't change anything. I used one whole bottle (though I wasted some by accidently spilling alot of it). I am not buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I've been using it for about a month now and I can really see a difference in my skin. The texture is smoother, it completely cleared up my skin/acne, and it keeps the redness away. Definitely worth a try! Natural, skin loving ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I wouldu2019ve known it was gonna help my skin tone and acne scars this much, I would have put down the cash for this A LOT sooner! Definitely worth every penny.   Iu2019ve had it for about a month or two, I try to use it at night and in the morning, but sometimes I skip one or both but am still seeing great improvements on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw results within a week of using the oil daily. I was skeptical at first because my skin breaks out easily, but this oil actually helped some of my stubborn acne subside, and my hyperpigmentation has improved a lot! I use this oil along with the blue tansy mask (which I use twice a week)- these two have made my skin so dewy and healthy looking. A little goes a long way (4-5 drops are more than enough) worth a try, and every penny! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could do 4.5 stars I would. I am an oily skin type so I use this only at night as I feel itu2019s too heavy for the morning. While I use it at night when I wake up my skin feels amazingly hydrated and soft throughout the entire day until I apply again at night leading me to notice that my skin produces less oil. My complexion is brighter and more even over all and Iu2019ve only been using it about 2 months. I feel certain that with more use my dark marks will begin to diminish even more. The .5 star that I removed is that it is very easy to apply too much and therefore the product does not sink in in a timely manner and can sit ontop of the skin. But itu2019s lovely and I would repurchase
