reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this oil.It is very moisturizing for my dry,mature skin.

reviews.review_title: Best oil for dry or combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best oil I have used in awhile.  Ingredient list speaks for itself. I have not broken out with hormonal acne in months. If I start to feel one coming in I put a small dab of this on the area and it's reduced. In that same note, when I do have one, they are smaller and to heal quicker I do the same.  Use this twice a day, 1-3 drops.  So good! Wish sephora offered the travel size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite skin oil. Ever. I have tried so many by different brands and this one is the winner! My skin feels supple and healthy and glows. I have somewhat sensitive, combination, hormonal acne prone skin and I thought the Lapis oil would be for me... but this one is the one I've had the best results with. Used with a cleanser and occasional masks, of course.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so glad I chose this oil! I have very dry, sensitive skin and this oil just soaks right in - no greasy film, doesnu2019t sit on top, and it is great for under makeup and primers as well. Itu2019s also fantastic for mixing with your moisturizer if you want to stretch it further. My husband has large pores and oily skin and loves this too! It also soaks right into his skin and leaves it glowing. Great product! Very clean and unscented - doesnu2019t irritate sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: Lovely, but doesn't keep its integrity.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to give this product 5 stars. I purchased this along with the Rose/Coconut Hydrating Face Mist by Herbivore last May, and used both products religiously until late July, when I ran out of mist. Used in conjunction, these products made my face so incredibly balanced and glowy that I was shocked every time I saw my reflection. I felt like they had taken years off the appearance of my skin. When I ran out of the mist, I continued to use the oil, but I didn't get the same effects. I still loved applying the oil: the scent was delicate and beautiful, and the product felt very nourishing and calming to my skin. My skin was well hydrated, but its texture just wasn't as smooth, and my pores not as tight as before. Because winter was approaching, I soon realized I needed something more moisturizing for my dry, aging skin, so I put this oil away in a dark, cool location over the winter while I used more hydrating products. But recently, as winter slowly recedes, I have begun using it again, and I've noticed a change. I believe the oil has possibly turned; I notice that the colour appears much more yellow than its initial bright orange (as in the product photo). Also, the smell is definitely different. Before, the oil had a lovely, fresh, almost herbal botanical scent to it; now, it smells sort of rancid-y, like straight rose hip seed oil tends to. I know this product does contain rose hip seed oil, but previously I could also detect the other ingredients, like rose, that combined to create such a lovely experience of use. Now I don't enjoy using it nearly as much, and I wonder if it's smart to use it at all. Annoying, considering the cost. I do love Herbivore Botanical's products, but I think for the coming spring and summer months I'll try the Rose/Coconut Face Mist along with their Orchid Oil, and hope that oil keeps its integrity longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Currently on Accutane. I was using the lapis oil but now since Iu2019m super dry I switched. WORTHHHHH THE PRICE. This moisturizes my skin, is lightening my acne scars. Any fine lines I was beginning to have have been diminished. Absolutely amazing I love Herbivore! Please never stop making this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was part of a cocktail that saved my mug from a dehydration that was too strong for most oils & creams to handle!  It has a subtle fragrance that fades quickly & did not irritate my highly sensitized skin. It absorbs well without turning into an oil slick: just warm 2-4 drops, with or without cream in your palms before pressing into your face (key!). I found adding a drop of cream made it absorb with a more pleasant finish (now use a tiny scoop of Pink Cloud w/2 drops of Phoenix on my dry skin for maintenance).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is great - it absorbs quickly, the scent is not overwhelming and it says to use daily but I do find it a little drying on my skin.  I am using it every second night and it seems to be working better.  The price is a bit high but overall I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this product but it really irritated my sensitive skin. Within the first 2 days of using I broke out really badly and my skin also started to get drier. I also had red patches on my skin after applying. If you have sensitive skin I would stay away from this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a skin care fanatic for years. My mom taught me to always take care of it.  I have a regimen I follow but had heard such great things about adding this oil..WOW..amazing! My skin is incredibly soft and stays that way! It had immediately taken care of 2 dry patches that no other product seemed to help. I have very sensitive skin. And no problems using this.  You use such a small amount that one bottle will last forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this oil for about a month and I am very, very pleased. I feel my complexion has become more even & bright and my face stays hydrated all day. I use it at least once a day, usually twice, and I couldnu2019t be happier. I would recommend this to anyone who needs an extra layer of hydration during the winter months. I plan on using it all year round because my skin is usually slightly dry no matter the season. As of now, I think itu2019s worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Personally this product didn't do much for me. I have pretty dry skin with occasional dry, flaky patches. I used it consistently for a week and saw no difference in my skin. For $88, I was pretty disappointed. I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this facial oil, it's the best I've tried!  My skin looks better and it feels great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: excellent product, results are amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent for dehydrated skin. Very light pleasant scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Herbivore before they came to Sephora and they are such a fantastc brand! My skin can get so dry in the winter that hardly anything can moisturize it. This product, however, keeps my skin soft without feeling thick and allows my skin to breathe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite oil, the texture is rich and moisturizing while also making my skin feel so healthy. I use this at night after my facial serum and moisturizer. It has helped with my acne and oil production (I have oily skin).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every night.  It is absorbed and leaves me with very neutral skin, not overly dewy like a sleeping mask but balanced.  My skin is sensitized and combination.  It doesnu2019t aggravate my hyperpigmentation or hormonal acne.

reviews.review_title: Made my skin drier and flakier
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was SO excited to try this oil after reading the reviews. I love my other Herbivore products and what the company stands for but unfortunately, this oil did not live up to the hype for me. After using the oil for a few days I woke up with two fat pimples and I NEVER get pimples. I figured I would use it for another week and give it a chance to work itself out but it just got worse and worse. I didn't get any other pimples luckily but my skin just became very flaky and dry all over. Mainly around my eyes, nose and mouth. I'm so disappointed! I thought this would be it for me but sadly the hunt continues for a great, hydrating face oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin feel amazing. It has a slight orange tint that fades fast but leaves a nice radiance. The smell is incredible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all of Herbivoreu2019s face oils!  I can definitely notice a difference after using this.  I usually apply it at night and wake up with brighter, smoother skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my ride-or-die skincare product, y'all. I have the driest, literally-flaking-off-my-face skin, and this stuff keeps me looking glowy and phresh af. I'm 21 so I can't say that it's done much by way of anti-aging, lol, but starting preventative skincare early feels great, and it certainly plumps up my face in a way that I imagine would do wonders for fine lines and wrinkles. Love love love the all-natural ingredients too.  Definitely worth the splurge--mine has lasted me 5 months of daily use and I'm only halfway through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is magic in a bottle. I am a skincare junkie and am an extremely picky customer especially when it comes to skincare. A few years ago, I started looking at ingredients of skincare/makeup products before I buy them. Long story short, I love EVERYTHING about this face oil-- the clean ingredients, the natural yet amazing smell, and the incredible results I have witnessed firsthand while using this oil.  Yes, it is hella pricey-- but it is well worth it! LOVE LOVE LOVE! Will definitely repurchase when I run out.  *For your reference, I have normal-to-dry skin and use about 10 drops at night and 5-6 drops in the morning.  SERIOUSLY THIS STUFF IS AMAZING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing..! So hydrating, and makes my skin just glow. Love it all from this line. They all have such a strange earthy smell, but it disappears almost immediately. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite nighttime moisturizer. It is heavyweight, which is why I prefer to use it for nighttime. After using this product for a week, my skintone was a lot brighter. It helps speed up the healing process of any existing pimples and scars that I have. This is a crucial part of my skincare routine.

I have been using the Phoenix oil at night and the Lapis oil during the day along with my regular skincare routine and have seen such a rapid improvement of the overall texture and clarity of my skin. I get breakouts frequently and after applying the Phoenix oil at night I wake up with almost all of my acne cleared ! This oil is fabulous for dry skin. I have chronically dehydrated skin and I can wear this during the day if I'd like, I just choose it for night time. The lapis oil is best for normal-oily skin. It doesn't offer the best hydration for my parched skin but it does help calm any irritation or redness I am experiencing. Both of these oils smell beautiful. Very natural. The Phoenix oil smells like chia seeds and roses lol the lapis oil smells like... a beautiful calming herbal tea. I recommend both of these oils tenfold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is amazing. I have tried some other oils, sold at sephora and elsewhere, nothing compares to this. I use it at night without a moisturizer and in the morning I wake up with bright, plump glowing skin. I have normal to slightly oily skin (so if you have dry skin, you might want to try it with a moisturizer, although it might be also good on its own, I don't know, you just need to try) and I have some fine lines and pores showing here and there (I'm in my 30s). I love it so much, I would bathe in this. The smell can be offputting though, the first time I opened it I almost regreted my purchase, but then I used it and it made me a believer. I cannot recommend enough!

Since using this I've noticed a difference in my skins overall tone and texture; it's more plump, moisturized, and even toned. My skin is very dehydrated and using 3 drops of this morning and night has made a huge difference.

I really liked the Orchid oil from this brand, it smelled heavenly and left my skin feeling soft. I figured I would try this oil out, but the rose smell was too much and the oil itself didn't absorb into my skin like the orchid oil. Instead, I'm left with a film of oil on my face. Also, the smell went bad less than 12 months after the bottle was open. I was extremely disappointed with this product.

I just love this oil! This product is fantastic. I have sensitive, acne prone, skin and this oil has been fantastic. I've only used it four times and it has already made the lines on my forehead and neck less visible. Also, it smells divine.

I used to use the Josie Maran Argan Oil, then wanted to try something new as I was looking for a change. This oil works great at night and I feel hydrated without being oily. When I use this oil during the day I use it as a moisturizer and let it soak in before applying makeup. I've just ordered the Lapis oil and I will likely alternate between the two (hopefully the Lapis works for me too!)

Hyper pigmentation life saver!Only 3 weeks in and I have a crazy dramatic difference in my skin. I use 3 drops at night and cover with my favourite hydrating cream. It's the only product that has been diminishing the scars on my face.

I drop a few drops of this with my regular moisturizing cream and I have beautiful, glowing, smooth skin! I don't wear foundation or any kind of concealer on my face, just eye makeup, and it helps me keep my skin beautiful and healthy!

reviews.review_title: Try it if your skin is freaking out
reviews.review_text: My skin has always been pretty much good, but courtesy of a medicine I had to take recently I had to deal with a major freak out - cystic and comedonal acne like I'd never had before, even as a teenager. I had been using AHAs, salicylic acid toner, HA moisturizer, and had to stop it all because I wasn't sure what was contributing to the issues.   I switched in a simple grapeseed oil that helped me stave off dryness, and then I remembered I had some of this left over from the winter when I had been using this as a layer over moisturizer at night for extra hydration (was great for this, but not $100 great).   My hyperpigmentation, scars, flaking, and the whole wreck that was left over after the reaction improved noticeably literally within hours of switching to this oil. I used a second dose before going to bed and when I woke up in the morning my skin had gone from worst of my life to a normal bad skin day overnight. A few days later, improvement has slowed down but is still making a difference and my skin is almost back to good/normal for me.

reviews.review_title: Didnt even have to put on makeup in the morning
reviews.review_text: This facial oil is my holy grail! and I finished just finished the bottle! I'll put my review as bulletpoints -literally lasted me 8 months, you only need 3 drops a day - I would use this only for night time just so that your skin doesnt get used to it and youll wake up with glowing skin every time (that same rule goes for the shampoos you use!) -use the dropper directly on your face, dont waste the product in your fingers -use a toner after you cleanse and before you use this oil and make sure it is fully dry before you do so -you'll feel like a rich housewife when using this oil btw -dark spots are gone! And I had a lot of them from picking at my acne! -You can use a moisturizer over this oil as well -overall a great product that I will be repurchasing:)

Behold the greatest face oil for combination skin! This stuff is worth every penny (and more).   I'll admit, I was skeptical at first. My skin is oily in my T-zone and very dry (think flaky, gross alligator skin) on the sides of my face. Right when I was about to give up hope, this bad boy swooped in and saved the day.   If you are prone to looking oily by the end of the day, I would recommend making this your night routine or letting it soak in for a solid 20 minutes before applying your foundation in the morning. When I use this at the beginning of the day (which is not often), I always make sure I use a setting powder to cover up any extra grease. When used at night, this stuff makes you wake up feeling hydrated, bright, and glowing. Seriously, it's magical stuff.

reviews.review_title: Thought it would be too greasy, but NOPE
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift from my boyfriend, who accidentally bought it instead of the Lapis oil, but wow am I glad he got this one instead! I have combination skin, with painful dry patches and an oily nose; I was worried that this would make my oily t-zone worse, but thanks to the Jojoba oil in this, it actually balanced out my skin and I actually woke up with a GLOW the morning after I used it! I will definitely be repurchasing this and using it religiously.
Works nicely layered under a moisturizer. Greasy on it's own. This product has a heavy floral scent that I am sensitive to. I love herbivore, but I won't be re purchasing this.

I bought this product to use with the moonfruit moisturizer. While the moonfruit really didn't work out for me, this oil wasn't as bad. The feel of it was luxurious but I didn't notice any difference in my skin as a result of applying it. I'm definitely returning both products.

Not sure why my first review of this product never posted...but I do want to leave my two cents. This product is definitely not for everyone. I have been using facial oils for years now, and was super excited to try this product because I love what the brand stands for. I loved the rose smell, but I found the oil to be too heavy for my skin. It actually made me breakout very badly and for this reason I had to return it.

reviews.review_title: Didn't Sink in, Too thick, felt like cooking oil
reviews.review_text: I am a lover of skin Oils...I have tried many different brands, this one seemed nice at first but after using it for 2 weeks, My skin somehow felt dryer and flakey. I couldn't understand it. Seemed to never really sink in. I had a feeling it would flare up some break outs (I know that's the evil words you don't wanna hear) The Lapis oil sank into my skin better, over all I like that one more. Still not 100% sold on this brands skin oils.  Returned item. Thank you Sephora for your gracious return policy.

This face oil has the perfect texture and smells herbal and flowery but is not too strong. I add it to my sunscreen and moisturizer in the mornings and all the products mix together perfectly. I use supergoop sunscreen and the youth to the people face wash and moisturizer. This has been the best combo for my skin for moisturizing and age prevention, as I just turned 30. The oil is a bit pricey but it will last a long time and it makes your moisturizer last longer too when you mix the two together. I strongly recommend this product!

My skin got really dull and dry this winter and I decided to add an oil to my routine instead of changing my moisturizer. I am not easily impressed so to say Herbivore's Phoenix Oil is the most delightful discovery ever says a lot. Within 3 weeks, it gave back a glow to my skin I'd never think of getting back.  It moisturizers without the oily feeling I was dreading. My skin feel soft and confortable again and, if that wasn't enough, it looks nice and bright. I'm a big fan of the container, the smell is the thing I like the least but with results like these, I'm more than willing to compromise.

this oil is incredible. makes my dry skin so soft. it smells a little like vegetable oil haha, but it feels really luxurious and high quality. keeps my skin clear and fresh. great after using the blue tansy mask. highly recommend!

I recently purchased Herbivore's Blue Tansy mask and fell in love with it, so I was very eager to try some more of their products. This is the most wonderful facial oil ever. A true staple to my nightly routine! I usually pat this over the Caudalie detox night oil and seal it with a moisturizer. When I wake up my skin is so clear and even and soft I just can't get enough. I love the ingredient list, and personally I would rather pay the price for a product that is pure with awesome ingredients, than a product packed with fillers like fragrance and other mystery items. In the morning when I prep my skin I mix a few drops of this oil with the Sunday Riley Tidal cream, and the two mesh so beautifully together. The oil really penetrates into the skin without looking or feeling greasy. I can't say enough about this, but I am so glad that i have it. Also, the bottle is beautiful in my bathroom.

I use this each night and the Lapis during the day.  This oil is amazing. My skin feels hydrated, not oily!! My skin is clearing, pore are decreasing in size on nose and cheeks.  Breakouts are less frequent.
I bought this over 6 months ago. It has lasted a long time and I use more than recommended as it's very dry here and my skin gets dry fast. I have tried many lotions and other oils.

I used to use boscia tsubaki oil as all other oils didn't smell good or didnt work etc.. I tried the herbivore as the tsubaki is little light and didn't hydrate enough. I loved the herbivore as it smells great (has flowery/rose fragrance) and doesn't irritate my skin or eyes due to fragrance... i didn't get any breakouts and my skin stays hydrated longer!

I was blown away by the immediate results I saw when using this product. My skin is normal, no breakouts but I do have some redness. This improved the texture of my skin, helped with the redness and my skin glows. I would highly recommend.

I've tried number of oils and this one is the best yet.  This one has slight rose scent that is pleasant and goes on skin easy. I have oil combo skin with acne on cheeks. The oil does not irritate nor make the acne worst. Helps to clear up scarring a bit and keeps my skin hydrated and soft. I use softener before the oil and seal the oil with a light layer of moisturizer. Def will be repurchasing this one!

This product will not disappoint, esp if you have dry skin like myself. I like the smell, but even if you are put off by it that will fade over time. It has a higher price point than some facial oils, but it does everything it is supposed to do.

Definitely lovable and highly effective - one of the best facial oils I have ever used. I have combination skin that leans more oily and is very reactive. I was nervous this oil wouldn't  mesh with my skin and/or would break me out, however after a few weeks of using Phoenix every other night or so, I am for sure obsessed. Each morning after using this oil, my skin looks more even, smooth, glowing and plump - in the best way. I actually do think my skin feels a little stronger and more firm as well, which I am all about. I have not experienced any sort of breakout, rather my skin is noticeably clearer. The scent is pleasant and subtle enough, and the lightweight texture is ideal for my sometimes oily skin - I don't feel a heaviness or greasiness that other oils can leave. Overall, I really wish I had bit the bullet sooner and purchased this forever ago. Phoenix truly delivers and I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: best oil I've used so far
reviews.review_text: I have quite the collection of face oils and the Phoenix oil is by far my favorite. Excellent quality, smells great, feels amazing and so moisturizing. I've tried the $170 RODIN olio lusso face oil and the Phoenix oil is WAY better.
Super hydrating and skin texture improves with use.

This is the most expensive skincare product I've owned by far, but the best. I noticed immediate results in a week. I pick at my skin all the time, bad habit I know, but this oil heals my scars so fast. I'd say 2 days and an intense scar left from deep cystic acne, gone, as if it was never there in the first place. I also struggle with texture and this helps too. If you have dull skin get this! Your skin will look so healthy. As I have acne prone skin on my face, neck, and entire back; I go through this bottle fairly fast. If you just use it for your face it'll last you at least 6 months.

reviews.review_title: Fountain of youth in an oil!!!
reviews.review_text: I love beauty oils so I have a rather large collection. I came across this one after I bought the face mist (another addiction) and fell in love with the ingredient list. I only use 3 drops after my night cream which is enough to do my face and neck area. Ps I also noticed that my cuticles are amazing ever since using this (some gets on my fingers and I now purposely rub it into my cyticles). I've been using this oil for about two weeks and already noticing my concealer doesn't have fine lines to settle into under my eyes anymore. I can't wait to see the results after a months use!!

I've only been using this oil about a week (and only in the mornings, as I use the Sunday Riley Luna at night) and WOW! My skin has already transformed. It looks and feels so smooth, I haven't even worn makeup. The smell isn't the best, but I can push through that for an amazing product. And yes, it's pricey, but the size will last me a long time, so you do get bang for your buck.

Can't stand the smell. I don't know what it is about Rose smells, but it's too strong for me. Makes me feel like i'm putting chemicals on my face. Also, pretty sure this broke me out. I woke up to new pimples in unusual spots.
Love! Great product.
Has been using this facial oil for two months. This oil works fantastic. It relieves my irritating skin and inflammation. Save my skin while seasonal allergy days.

This is one of the best facial oils I have ever used. It has made its way into my regular routine. It moisturizes and nourishes the skin. I use it at nights and during the day I alternate to LAPIS. Since using both, I have started to feel confident not wearing makeup foundation at all.

I have become compulsive about my skincare and have begun collecting products that I love and will define as my Holy Grail...Well, this is one of those items that will fill that spot.  I am a retin-a user and my skin was begging for hydration.  This product like no other has filled the bill.  It does what it says, smells light and fresh, and the bottle is like a decoration...Love it!    I will try their other products.

I purchased the rollerball set directly from Herbivore's online store, just to see how my skin would react before I committed to the full size bottle, and OMG... this stuff serious business. I've used a number of different oils on my combo oily/dehydrated acne prone skin, and none has delivered results like this bad boy! I have pigmentation along my jawline from hormonal acne, lots of localized redness in the center of my face, and the perimeter of my face is always tight and itchy. Well it's been 8 days, and the redness is noticeably cleared, my pigmentation is almost gone, and my face feels so comfortable and balanced. This is holy grail status for me, and the fact that I can use whatever is left on my hands as a treatment for the ends of my hair is just a bonus. Packaging is also beautiful, durable, and looks chic in my cabinet.

reviews.review_title: Great alone, add to lotion for more hydration!
reviews.review_text: Nice scent that is not overpowering, soaks in quickly, great on its own in the summer or blended with lotion in the winter for  extra hydration. The dropper allows you to easily adjust how much you want to apply depending your skin needs. Love that is is both a natural and effective product--bonus, you can buy the small roller for travel and easily refill it from the large bottle.   Have noticed a difference in how quickly dark spots fade on my fair skin since starting to use this about a month ago.

Have been using this oil consistently for over a month now. It smells nice, looks pretty, but my skin hasn't changed. No improvement in signs of aging. It is moisturizing and overall fine but wouldn't suggest this for someone concerned with wrinkles.

I hate to be the only one not to give a 5-star review but this product just wasn't magic for me. I've been using it for about 2 months now and my skin looks about the same. The first month I had no issues but then it seemed like my pores started to clog. It's a great moisturizer; kept my skin hydrated in the driest of climates but I don't think it's for every skin type. For the price, I was expecting to have my dream skin but sadly this isn't the case. The hunt continues.

J'ai vu ce produit sur le site de Gwyneth Paltrow, GOOP, et les commentaires m'ont interpelee. Je voulais essayer une huile pour le visage alors j'ai tente le coup! Quelle belle decouverte et quel produit parfait pour les aimants du naturel. Ma peau est plus belle et a l'air plus en sante. Ce n'est pas trop gras u00e0 l'application et est absorbe rapidement. Je l'utilise avec le masque Brighten de la mu00eame compagnie! Je les recommande!

I have been using this for the past few nights instead of my usual night cream and it is a gorgeous product for my dry, mature skin. My skin is glowing in the morning, and noticeably smoother! I use 4 or 5 drops which seems to cover well and leaves a little for my hands too. The bottle is beautiful and simple packaging and even fits the guidelines for liquids when traveling.
I am very happy with this product so far - feels very conditioning with out making my skin feel greasy.

This is the richest, most luxurious oil. I had my eye on this oil for a while, but wasn't ready to splurge. I was just going to get a rosehip oil, but was sold on this after learning it had rosehip plus other super beneficial ingredients, synergy is worth the extra money. It sinks in and leaves my skin feeling super hydrated especially in the winter when it's extra dry out. Its too heavy for daytime for me so I use the Lapis oil and just use this at night. Not only does this oil do an amazing job of keeping my skin hydrated, but its the most beautiful bottle on my bathroom counter - so special.

I'm a big fan of oils and have tried all kinds, camellia, jojoba, argan, chamomile, various blends, etc. Never have I found an oil as effective as this. I have combo dehydrated skin that is not acne prone but when I get clogged, I get dark spots and need help keeping my skin tone even. This oil manages to fix my issues with dryness while not making my skin oily and gives me a lovely amazing glow that is not a greasy oily look. Thanks to the sea buckthorn oil which is a natural retinoid, it is also making my skin softer and more even in tone. I honestly am scared of running out of this and am telling all my friends how ridiculously good it is. The price is daunting but it is worth it I swear. I used it today to replace my usual moisturizer and my skin survived my commute through 20 degree weather, cold wind and the drying environment of my office while staying hydrating and glowy. If you're on the fence about this, jump off and just get it!

reviews.review_title: An awesome oil for dry skin!
reviews.review_text: My skin is extremely dry even in summer so I'm always on a mission to find a good facial oil that actually works, and I've found it! It looks pricey but you only need 5-10 drops daily so this bottle will last you for a while. Strongly recommend!!

this oil absorbs well, i use it nightly and i have been for about a month now and there has been a noticeable improvement in the texture and tone of my skin. HIGHLY recommend. i prefer it over tarte, argan, origins ect.
I've never used a better oil that has helped my skin in less than a week. Made an even skin tone and even helped my blemishes disappear. I would definitely buy this oil again.

This oil is so amazing, I can't get enough of it. I use this oil primarily on my dry patches and it hydrates my skin so well, that my skin is seamless when I wake up. I like that it absorbs into my skin so well, and that it's not greasy. This makes my skin so supple and fresh looking!

This oil is very hydrating and healing. I have been using it on scars from piercings, blemishes and stretch marks and it is helping! It has made my piercing scars lighter and improved the texture of my skin. These oils from Herbivore Botanicals are amazing!!
After my first use, I noticed a big difference. My coworker even asked what I was using. I love the natural ingredients and highly recommend.
use it everyday, my favorite for face godliness.

I was hesitate to try one an oil moisturizer - but after trying a couple of the other Herbivore products and loving them - I decided to give this one a go. I am so pleased with this purchase. The oil is moisturizing but not at all heavy feeling on your face. It works beautifully under foundation and when used without make-up gives your skin a lovely healthy glow. The all-natural factor of Herbivore products is a great bonus to how wonderfully the products themselves work. Do yourself a favor and try this oil - you won't be sorry!

I am a big lover of oils since my skin is so dry. I used to use just straight up rose hip oil (because of its many benefits, such as fading scars). When I finished my bottle, I decided to try something else out and found out Herbivore and fell in love with everything they stand for. Did a little research on the ingredients and decided to take the plunge despite the pricey price tag. And.... I'm in love! This moisturized my skin even more than the rose hip oil. For me, it isn't greasy and I actually use it under my makeup. The beautiful, minimalistic and simple packaging is definitely a plus! It goes great with my room (-;

This is the moisturizer you want, morning and night, for the long term care of your face. It moisturizes and softens beautifully. It is never greasy, gooey, sticky or heavy. It has a subtle, elegant scent and does a great job under makeup. An added bonus is that this, like all Herbivore products, is tastefully packaged, so you can leave it on the counter and know that you have the best available.
This oil absorbs quickly, has a light smell, hydrates beautifully & makes your skin glow. So glad I picked up! Anyone who wants to try a facial oil - this is the one!
Amazing & 100% natural. Definitely worth buying. You know what you are getting and paying for. Most oils & creams are full of things you should never put on your skin.

reviews.review_title: hands down, favorite facial oil ever.
reviews.review_text: I've tried countless facial oils over the past few years, but honestly none of them have compared to the Phoenix oil from Herbivore. A) The experience of using it is so luxurious, from the chic packaging to the subtle rose smell. B) It works! It sinks into my skin more than I've seen from other oils, and it leaves the perfect amount of dewiness. Hydrated and glowy vs. slick and oily. I use it under makeup during the day and at night, on its own, or under night cream. This is also a pretty good sized bottle, and I've barely made a dent in it after using it 2X a day. Love!

This oil has nourished my dry skin! I love how it feels when I put it on and it absorbs so well. I was a little worried about the price but reading all the other positive reviews gave me the confidence to purchase and I'm so glad I did. Thanks herbivore for such an effective and natural product!!

I have very oily skin and was scared to use oils on my face, but since I started using Phoenix, my skin feels so soft and I have no annoying residue on my face. My skin has evened out and I can go without makeup and feel comfortable.

reviews.review_title: The fix you need for dry winter skin!
reviews.review_text: I stumbled upon this while looking at other much more expensive oils and I'm so glad I did. There's no artificial dyes, fragrances or chemicals that would irratate sensitive skin. I've been using this for a few weeks and it's really helping get rid of my awful dry flakey winter skin. A few drops go a long way and I've found it applies a lot easier to damp skin.

I used to be terrified of facial oils because of my combination skin and the fear that it would just make my t zone even oiler. But I took a chance and boy am I thrilled. My skin has really evened out and I feel like it's even softer and smoother. I have also had fewer break outs.

This. Oil. Is. Wonderful. I could go on and on, but I'm going to try and keep it short and sweet. This has helped my dehydrated, sensitive skin. The smell is great and makes my skin look just flat it amazing. Plump and glowing to be exact. I'm not exaggerating at all when I say that this works wonders and I'll never be without it. I can't wait to try the Orchid and Lapis oil as well!

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite facial oil!
reviews.review_text: Most of the facial oil clogs my skin but not this one. My face tends to feel a bit tight during the winter. This facial oil really helps to lock in moisture and minimize fine lines due to dryness.

I was nervous about this oil when I got it (part of a package with several other trial products from Herbivore). My skin is generally oily--though I'm a recent convert to the oil craze--and I shy away from oils that aren't advertised for the oily among us. But this was amazing--my skin has responded so well. Soft but not greasy, decrease in blackheads, almost no new pimples, and overall clear and glowy. The smell isn't as intoxicating as other Herbivore products but is still lovely.

During the winter months I tend to develop dry spots of skin in random places so I purchased this oil after hearing so many great things about the brand. I am so glad I did because I love it! It provides the perfect amount of moisture for my skin without making it oily. My skin feels soft and I love the scent.

reviews.review_title: Don't be scared to try it!
reviews.review_text: I was a little nervous about trying an oil as a moisturizer, as I'm super prone to break outs and a change of routine is practically spelling disaster, but I had heard good things and I am so glad I tried it. Phoenix oil is so yummy smelling, hydrating, and long lasting. I swear I might have this bottle for the rest of my life.  I wash my face with one of their bar soaps, spritz on some Rose Hibiscus water, and then put about 4-5 drops of this oil on the back of my hand and then slather it all over my face and neck. It takes a little while to sink in, so if you use this in the morning be sure to do it a bit before putting the rest of your make up on.  Typically, after about a month or so of using a product, I begin to not see the benefits and it starts to become like any other items I've used before. Not so with Herbivore's products. I fall in love all over again every time I wake up and my skin is GLOWING and so soft.  Honestly, I cannot say enough good things about this oil. DO keep it away from sunlight however and in a cooler spot. I accidently left mine out for a couple weeks in direct sunlight and it altered the smell a little - not terrible but not as yummy as it was when I started.

I picked this up as part of a sampler pack of face oils. I've never used face oils before but my skin is very dry so I though they would help. I was amazed at how hydrating these oils were but not heavy or oily at all. They are super refreshing, smell great and really work. I noticed an immediate change in the texture of my skin (so smooth!), color (no more splotches!) and glow (luminous!). I would recommend this to someone of any skin type.

I like this product. I like that it is all natural first of all and love that it makes my skin look bright, dewy and glowing from within. People have seen a difference in my skin since ive been using this. I dont see any difference as far as acne scars go but it does a little slight help with fine lining and wrinkles. SLIGHT... I feel I wont buy this one again though because its very expensive Ill get the cheaper one in the future. You do get a lot of product a little goes a long way however in the winter you cant use this alone or your skin will suffer from dryness. It absorbs very well and is great for my combo skin and doesnt cause me to break out. I wish this line was sold in store!!!!

This is a very beautiful and luxurious product! I have sensitive skin, fairly dry but also prone to breakouts from time to time, and I've been searching for a perfect moisturizer forever. Smells lovely, goes on silky rather than greasy, and absorbs fully. No breakouts. I live in a dry climate and I can get away with using this as a stand alone moisturizer. As far as effectiveness goes - a couple weeks of use and my skin is very soft and feels hydrated, though I don't know if I can detect much change in appearance, I guess I'll see with more use. So it really does the job as a moisturizer for me, but when this bottle is done I might keep searching for something a bit cheaper.

This is a great oil for dry skin, and I have sensitive acne-prone skin and this has not broken me out at all. Out of all their oils this is thickest feeling and I use this at night or on days I feel is super dry. I also use cream over top of this oil at night and serum + another oil under it. I've seen a huge difference in the texture and hydration of my skin. For the price point and quantity/quality, I am going to say it's worth every penny. I also like their Lapis oil for the day as well.

My skin is very sensitive and dry with flaky splotches, and this oil does a very good job hydrating my skin. The Phoenix oil is the most hydrating of the three Herbivore oils. I wear this oil overnight, because it takes a while for the oil to absorb into my skin, and I wake up with smooth, hydrated skin. I really like how the ingredient list consists of just oils. I would recommend this oil for anyone who is looking for a high quality unprocessed oil with dry or sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: For a healthy glow and compliments...
reviews.review_text: use this stuff. I've been using it twice daily for the past several months with great effect. My skin texture is smoother, my skin is hydrated, and my face is glowing. I originally bought this because I was looking for a cheaper alternative to the Rodin Olio (which I have never used). I honestly don't see a need to try the Rodin now--I'm that happy with this stuff. My coworkers and friends noticed a difference within just a few weeks of use. It was a God-send when I was on Accutane, and it's still lovely now.  By the way, I used this throughout the summer and never had an issue with clogged pores--a miracle because I'm acne prone.
This facial oil is everything. After I started using it all of my friends followed because it is that good. It really works. Must have.
